content.p: Any lot of fertilizer not in compliance with the provisions of to shall be subject to seizure on complaint of the director to a court of competent jurisdiction in the area in which said fertilizer is located. In the event the court finds the said fertilizer to be in violation of to and orders the condemnation of said fertilizer, it shall be disposed of in any manner consistent with the quality of the fertilizer and the laws of the state, except in no instance shall the disposition of said fertilizer be ordered by the court without first giving the claimant an opportunity to apply to the court for release of said fertilizer or for permission to reprocess or relabel said fertilizer to bring it into compliance with to
